publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-983 Mr Jim Wallace: Regulation of Investigatory Powers (Scotland) Bill-That the Parliament agrees to the general principles of the Regulation of Investigatory Powers (Scotland) Bill. Supported by: Angus MacKay*
